description: Trello-like board system with drag & drop lists and cards for project/task management. Boards can be standalone or linked to projects/directories.
goal: Create a Kanban-style board interface where users can organize tasks with lists and cards, supporting drag & drop, collapsible lists, and rich card features including attachments
requirements: Standalone boards (can exist without project linking)
Optional linking to projects or directories
Drag & drop for cards between lists
constraints: Reuse Notes window pattern for new window functionality
